Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Adams
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Fullerton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
